meanings.definition: A dish of thinly sliced meat rolled around a filling, typically ham and cheese.
meanings.sent1: I ordered the delicious saltimboccas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is famous for its mouthwatering saltimboccas.
meanings.sent3: The saltimboccas on my plate looked like little meaty presents.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills are like magic; she can turn simple ingredients into flavorful saltimboccas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling saltimboccas filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A type of Italian cuisine known for its use of saltimboccas.
meanings.sent1: Italian restaurants often feature traditional saltimboccas on their menus.
meanings.sent2: The cookbook highlighted the rich history of Italian saltimboccas.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion was a celebration of Italian culture, complete with homemade saltimboccas.
meanings.sent4: In the world of Italian cuisine, saltimboccas are like little bites of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering saltimboccas brought back memories of Italy.
